thread.title: A’s shortstop Marcus Semien making strides under Ron Washington
thread.title_full: A’s shortstop Marcus Semien making strides under Ron Washington - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Susan Slusser
title: A’s shortstop Marcus Semien making strides under Ron Washington
text:
Photo: Beck Diefenbach, Special To The Chronicle Oakland Athletics batter Marcus Semien celebrates after scoring a homerun during the second inning of the baseball game against the San Francisco Giants on Thursday, April 2, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Oakland Athletics batter Marcus Semien celebrates after scoring a...
SEATTLE — Oakland has a work-in-progress throughout the season at shortstop and as the season comes to a close, there is little doubt that Marcus Semien has made major strides at the position. Oakland Athletics batter Marcus Semien celebrates after scoring a homerun during the second inning of the baseball game against the San Francisco Giants on Thursday, April 2, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. Oakland Athletics batter Marcus Semien celebrates after scoring a...
